name: Defend your Taters!
description:
You are one of the many peasants farming potatoes. However, There are some otherworldly monsters that want to eat all of your potatoes! You must prevent them from touching any of your potatoes with the only weaponry you can find: Rocks.

Press and hold space to begin aiming. When you want to shoot, let go.

Week 8 Game for my Rapid Prototyping class. My first attempt at prototyping something in Unity.

Topic: Abstract Fantasy

Theme:  Peasant trying to defend his potato farm from the monsters.

Constraints: Physics based, Must have a throw-able rock.
